item.title: Streaming 101 - Part 1
item.description: Jump In! The best way I’ve found to learn things in technology is by immersion, so we’ll start with a short intro and then this first part 1 will be focused on saving money with streaming through an old school style HD antenna. In part 2 we’ll dive into Internet streaming services and options. Why do you want to stream anyway? The past few years has seen a surge in people cutting the cord.

item.title: Neti for your health
item.description: Flush those nostrils :) Winter’s the season for the sniffles. Combine that with the COVID pandemic that has put a strain on the healthcare system, and prevention of common ailments is becoming extremely important for us all. Luckily there is a simple solution to lessen the severity of (and in some cases prevent) these conditions. Disclaimer: I am not a medical professional, and although will be providing links to medical resources and practices, this does not replace professional medical advice.

item.title: Carpet Stain Solution
item.description: A simple solution I’ve used on almost any carpet stain for fast professional quality results! So, quite a number of years ago my girlfriend (now wife) and I had an apartment together in a historical district of town. We started with basically nothing. The floors were hardwood and so we purchased some rugs for the living and bedroom areas. My girlfriend had brought her white-fabric couches from her apartment when she moved in.
